What a random find this place was! My original intention was going to this other restaurant in the Gothic area, but the menu was entirely Catalynan and a bar setting, and it just wasn't right for a lunch setting with my family.  We veered off and found this gem.  What drew our attention to this place was their lunch special: 3 courses + drink for 9.95 Euros only if you inside but we had no problem with that.  I ordered the calamari, beef filet, and chocolate/marscapone dessert and of course a white wine.  I really enjoyed each dish, and it was quite a good serving size! I was leery that they may have downsized each dish because of the special lunch deal, but I was so full afterwards.  My favorite dish was the beef filet as it was cooked perfectly and it just broke apart with great seasoning and flavors.  It was spot on.  I also really enjoyed the dessert.  I don't often eat things with marscapone but glad that I got to have some on this trip!Definitely coming back for this lunch special!
